author: ETA PRIME
description:
Looking for the BEST tech deals under $100? Amazon’s Black Friday week sale is loaded with huge discounts on tablets, controllers, storage, Fire TVs, handheld accessories, and more — and in this video I break down my top picks that are actually worth buying.
These are products I personally use or would recommend, from Fire HD tablets to portable monitors, Xbox controllers, SD cards, streaming sticks, 4K TVs, and even a big discount on the Lenovo Legion Go.

Legion Go: https://bestbuycreators.7tiv.net/JKnLWa
TOSHIBA 43" Class C350 4K: https://amzn.to/4o3XW8c
Amazon Fire HD 10 tablet: https://amzn.to/4kr9e4G
Amazon Fire Max 11 tablet: https://amzn.to/3TSf4RB
Fire Tablet 8 : https://amzn.to/3GrbxXo
Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K Max: https://amzn.to/40ud7yw
Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K: https://amzn.to/4lvHc8Y

xbox controller: https://amzn.to/46HuEXx
INSIGNIA 40” Class F40: https://amzn.to/42yQbiO
Official Luna Wireless Controller: https://amzn.to/4eH5eMc
title: The BEST Tech Under $100! Amazon Black Friday Week
